sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Copies the value from Reservable Module name field and stores in the the Reservable Module title field.</description>
        <name>Copy module name to module title</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var moduleGr = new GlideRecord(WSDConstants.TABLES.ReservableModule.name);
moduleGr.addNullQuery('title');
moduleGr.query();

while (moduleGr.next()) {
	var title = moduleGr.getValue('name');
	moduleGr.setValue('title', title);

	if (!moduleGr.update())
		WSDLogger.error("Fix Script: Copy module name to module title", "Unable to update tile of reservable module.", moduleGr.getLastErrorMessage());
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-11-04 12:49:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6ac7c032076730105a57aece1ad3001a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Copy module name to module title</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6ac7c032076730105a57aece1ad3001a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-11-04 15:13:27</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Copy module name to module title
